mapper.sql: sn, elsname, elsjiaddr, elsroaddr, latitude, longitude, comregno, email, chief, email2, phone,ddname,ddphone,zipcode,regimg
mapper.select:
select
from etcgo
where 1 = 1
and elsname like concat('%',#{elsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by elsname asc
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

select count(*) from etcgo where 1 = 1
and elsname like concat('%',#{elsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select
FROM etcgo ORDER BY elsname
